Billy Wirth https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Wirth 0 William E. "Billy" Wirth (born June 23, 1962) is an American actor, film producer, and artist, perhaps best known for his role as Dwayne in the 1987 film, The Lost Boys. William_E._"_Billy_"_Wirth ( born June_23_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor , film_producer , and artist , perhaps_best_known for his_role as Dwayne in the_1987_film , The_Lost_Boys .
